parameter.name: entry
parameter.answer: model_builder.py

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player start the project.

parameter.name: help_in_main_menu_command
parameter.answer: the help command or selection number that at the main menu to give instructions to players.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player input help command in the main menu

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player input a wrong selection in the main menu

parameter.name: start_game_command
parameter.answer: The start game command or selection number that at the main menu to start the game.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player start the game.

parameter.name: help_in_game
parameter.answer: The help command that in the main menu to give avaliable commands list to players.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player does the 'help' command in the game

parameter.name: directions
parameter.answer: A path from the starting point towards a room or place.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player does NOT get an error (for example, 'Moving to living room.').

parameter.name: check_inventory_command
parameter.answer: The command for checking the player's inventory.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player does NOT have an item in their inventory (for example, 'Inventory: None').

parameter.name: directions
parameter.answer: A path from the starting point towards a room or place containing an item, separated by commas.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output after the player picks up the item, assuming no errors (for example, 'You picked up the key.').

parameter.name: directions
parameter.answer: A path from the room or place containing an item to victory, separated by commas.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player wins the game (for example, 'Congratulations! You won the game.').

parameter.name: exit_command
parameter.answer: The exit game command or selection number that at the main menu to exit the game.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player exits the game.
